summary: A man in a military uniform speaks at a podium, addressing the media about the U.S.'s stance on sending troops to Ukraine. He emphasizes that there are no plans to deploy U.S. service members to fight in Ukraine, but mentions ongoing efforts to provide security assistance to Ukraine through an international effort. The speaker is identified as Patrick Ryder, U.S. Air Force Brigadier General.
keywords: Patrick Ryder, U.S. Air Force, Brigadier General, Washington, D.C., Feb. 27, 2024, Global News, U.S. service members, Ukraine, Russia, security assistance, international effort
